title: 109_hr4543
content: Makes it the policy of the United States to: (1) work to ensure the divestiture by US government and private pension plans or thrift savings plans and mutual funds sold or distributed in the United States of all investments in any bank or financial institution that directly or through a subsidiary has outstanding loans to or financial activities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia or its instrumentalities, and (2) ensure there is no such future investment.
